name: Nemesis (itch) (TwoPieceVypur)
description:
The Nemesis Must be stopped, They will be stopped. You are the guard, the watcher, protect us.

WASD - Basc movement Q E R - Primary abilities Left click - Slash attack Left Click (movement Mode) - Grapple Hook Left Right Click - Summon and throw Right Click (Movement Mode) - Grapple hook Right F - Change Attack/Movement Mode
